# Noise & Conversational Buffer

> **Type**: Filter
> **Domain**: System

## Description
This skill acts as a sink for non-technical commands, adversarial traps, and conversational filler that should NOT trigger a core workflow. It prevents false positives by providing a high-entropy target for common worldly nouns and verbs.
